data.name: 抽屉轻(chouti clean)
data.description: 抽屉新热榜(chouti.com)的样式优化 1. 整理社交模块及footer 2. 浮动元素静态化 3. 字体调轻 4. 一些其他样式调整 配合油猴脚本 抽屉眼不见为净 还能过滤内容或评论哦

data.name: Steam - Holiday Profile 2019
data.description: The Steam Holiday Profile 2019 is finally here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile, or you simply want to use this profile permanently, then here you have it! ❄️ Merry Xmas everyone! Feel free to share it with all your friends! [ Version: 5 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥
